content.question:
This sculpture of George Washington was made by Jean-Antoine Houdon at the end of the eighteenth century.

Identify the stylistic period of the work. Discuss the elements of the sculpture that place it within this stylistic period. Explain why these elements are used in this depiction of George Washington.

frqParts.text:
This sculpture of George Washington was made by Jean-Antoine Houdon at the end of the eighteenth century.

Identify the stylistic period of the work. Discuss the elements of the sculpture that place it within this stylistic period. Explain why these elements are used in this depiction of George Washington.

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
